periods.name: This Afternoon
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 63. Southeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 1am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 65 overnight. South southeast wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy. High near 80, with temperatures falling to around 76 in the afternoon. South southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 7pm and 10pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could be severe. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. South southwest wind 5 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 43 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 1pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 66. East wind 3 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 53. Northeast wind 7 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a high near 68. East northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 57. South southeast wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a high near 66. West wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Some of the storms could produce heavy rain. Cloudy, with a low around 46. North wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 56. North wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
periods.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 7pm. Partly cloudy, with a low around 35. North northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Monday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 52. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
